fields.name: time_period_category
fields.description:
Indicates a standard time period to aid further aggregation. For example:
All day
Peak
Off-peak
Summer
Other

fields.name: total_entries
fields.description: Number of events at the stop considered entries, such as boardings or fare transactions.

fields.name: total_exits
fields.description: Number of events at the stop considered exits, such as alightings.

fields.name: number_of_transactions
fields.description: Number of fare transactions that occurred at a stop.

fields.name: transaction_revenue_x
fields.description:
Indicates the revenue from a specified fare medium. For example, cash revenue would be represented by the field name transaction_revenue_0. Valid values for x are:
0 - Cash or coins.
1 - Smart card or ticket.
2 - Magnetic-stripe card or ticket.
3 - Bank card (credit or debit card).
4 - Mobile NFC (smartphone tap, etc.).
5 - Optical scan (of mobile app screen or paper ticket).
6 - Button pressed by driver or operator to indicate a boarding or alighting passenger.
7 - Other type.

fields.name: transaction_count_x
fields.description:
Number of fare transactions made by a distinct fare_media_type.
Valid values for x are:
0 - Cash or coins.
1 - Smart card or ticket.
2 - Magnetic-stripe card or ticket.
3 - Bank card (credit or debit card).
4 - Mobile NFC (smartphone tap, etc.).
5 - Optical scan (of mobile app screen or paper ticket).
6 - Button pressed by driver or operator to indicate a boarding or alighting passenger.
7 - Other type.

fields.name: bike_entries
fields.description: Number of bikes that entered the stop.

fields.name: bike_exits
fields.description: Number of bikes that exited the stop.

fields.name: ramp_entries
fields.description: Number of entries that used a ramp or accessible entrance.

fields.name: ramp_exits
fields.description: Number of exits that used a ramp or accessible exit.

name: station_activities.schema.json
description: Summarized transactions, entries, and exits by stop or station and time period for each service date (for events not associated with a trip).
